item.title: OB/GYNs Tell Patients Acetaminophen is Safe in Pregnancy
item.description: Health organizations reject the Trump Administration’s assertion of a link between using acetaminophen in pregnancy and autism. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Genomic Medication Tests: Should the NHS Catch Up?
item.description: As pharmacogenetic testing expands in private healthcare, questions grow over equity, access, and whether the NHS should keep up. Medscape News UK

item.title: Mediterranean Diet Reduces Psoriasis Severity in Trial
item.description: Mediterranean diet significantly reduces disease severity and improves quality of life in those with mild-to-moderate psoriasis compared with that of ...

item.title: Poultry Consumption Linked to Long-Term Health Outcomes
item.description: New long-term data show a possible link between poultry intake and gastrointestinal cancer. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Is Diabetes Driving Your Patient’s Knee Pain?
item.description: Don’t chalk up knee pain in your diabetic patients to just wear and tear on the joints. It’s often an overlooked complication of the disease. Medscape...
